page.title: 07Children's names
page.content: We did a study on the boys and girls names in our school.We asked some children what their mums and grandmas' names are.The most unusual grandmas' names are Gwendoline, Muriel and Irene.The most unusual mums' names are Vivienne,Rita and Brenda.The mums' and grandmas' names are different from the childrens' names in our school today. The most unusual girls' names in our school are Thomasina,Jacqueline,Nina and Mellisa.The most popular girls' names in our school are Claire,Lisa, Rachel,Nicola and Tracy.We found that the most popular boys' names were Paul,David,Mark and Wayne.In our school there are eight Marks,eleven Pauls,nine Davids,and five Waynes.We have three sets of identical twins in one school.Children are often named after famous people,such as footballers,or television stars.
